document.heading: Uniform Commercial Code Revision Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-299, the “Uniform Commercial Code Revision Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-136. The Bill was adopted on first reading on Dec. 4, 2012. Signed by the Mayor on Feb. 8, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-667 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-299 became effective on Apr. 27, 2013.
